original: Kusalo atīto dhammo nakusalassa naatītassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁kusal o ▁atīt o ▁dhammo ▁na kusal assa ▁na a tīt assa ▁dhammassa ▁ārammaṇapaccay ena ▁paccayo ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā ekādasa, anantare samanantare soḷasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, natthiyā vigate soḷasa. (Anāgataṁ atītasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁ārammaṇe ▁aṭṭhārasa ▁ adhipatiyā ▁ekādasa ▁anantar e ▁sam an antare ▁soḷasa ▁upanissaye ▁aṭṭhārasa ▁natthi yā ▁vigat e ▁soḷasa ▁anāgat aṃ ▁atīt asadis aṃ
